items.title: 'A moving moment' as Rosenior breaks barriers
items.description: Liam Rosenior's appointment as Chelsea manager is a "massive moment" for representation in the Premier League.

items.title: US may intercept and seize oil tanker sailing near UK, reports say
items.description: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.

items.title: Fresh snow and ice warnings as Storm Goretti approaches UK
items.description: Hundreds of schools have been closed due to the snow and cold temperatures.

items.title: No conspiracy over Israeli football fans ban, West Midlands Police say
items.description: Senior police officers reiterate banning Israeli fans from the Villa game was "based on safety".

items.title: Learner drivers may face mandatory six-month gap between theory and practical tests
items.description: A minimum learning period of up to six months could be introduced for learner drivers
